A Bengaluru resident said he received an estimated Rs 22 lakh repair bill for a car worth half the amount, which was damaged due to flooding in the city last month.

articles.title: Aston Martin DBX707 launched at Rs 4.63 crore - Team-BHP
articles.description: Aston Martin has launched the DBX707 SUV in India at a price tag of Rs 4.63 crore (ex-showroom). The DBX707 costs Rs 48 lakh more than the standard DBX, making it the costliest car in the company’s line-up in India. The Aston Martin DBX707 uses the same 4.

articles.title: Flipkart Big Dussehra Sale announced: iPhone 13 to be available under ₹50,000? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Flipkart Big Dussehra Sale will offer a 10% instant discount on purchases made using HDFC Bank credit card along with EMI transactions.
